Walkscape Walkthrough

Tip of the Day
The base chance to find most Chests is 1/250, which you can increase with better gear and tools.

Pets

From Walkscape Walkthrough

Namespaces

  • Page
  • Discussion

More

  • More

Page actions

  • Read
  • View source
  • History
  • Purge

Pets are companions that you can summon to join and aid you on your travels in Arenum. Pets hatch from pet eggs that can be found by doing some activities or by purchasing them from shops.

There are currently five pets in the game:

  1. Camel
  2. Chicken
  3. Dolphin
  4. Reindeer
  5. Tortoise

Trivia

  • According to Schamppu everything in Arenum hatches from eggs, including the player character.[1]
  1. ↑ https://discord.com/channels/1037510064333926402/1196163572661755964/1450783880767602741
Retrieved from "https://wiki.walkscape.app/index.php?title=Pets&oldid=39683"
